item.title: Discord Hackers Claim To Have 1.5TB Of Age Verification Photos
item.content:encoded:
Details of the recent Discord data hack continue to paint a darker picture for the company and its users. According to Discord news source Discord Previews, the group taking responsibility for the compromise claims to have an enormous amount of user data, specifically millions of user photos.

In a post on social media Discord Previews said that ‚Äúthe perpetrators of this attack claim to have obtained 1.5 TB of age-verification photos totalling 2,185,151 images.‚Äù It was added that the stolen data is being used, as with most instances like this, to ‚Äúextort Discord‚Äù.

On October 3, Discord publicly announced that an ‚Äúunauthorized party compromised one of Discord‚Äôs third-party customer service providers.‚Äù This incident, which happened in late September, had the following data impacted:

  • Name, Discord username, email, and other contact details if provided to Discord customer support
  • Limited billing information, such as payment type, the last four digits of your credit card, and purchase history, if associated with your account
  • IP addresses
  • Messages with our customer service agents 
  • Limited corporate data (training materials, internal presentations)

Information such as full credit card and CCV numbers, private messages, passwords, and other authentication data wasn‚Äôt involved.

According to Discord‚Äôs own policies, ID submissions are supposed to be deleted after age verification is complete.

‚ÄúDiscord and k-ID do not permanently store personal identity documents or your video selfies,‚Äù they say. ‚ÄúThe image of your identity document and the ID face match selfie are deleted directly after your age group is confirmed, and the video selfie used for facial age estimation never leaves your device.‚Äù

Insider Gaming has reached out to Discord for comment on how the company is looking to move forward and why so many age-verification photos were still within the company‚Äôs database. Should a response be received, it will be added to this story.

What do you think of the Discord hack leaving millions of user photos and information exposed? Leave your thoughts down in the comments below, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming, check out what games were the best-selling titles for August 2025. And don‚Äôt forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Fallout Day 2025 Announced, Broadcast Date & Time Revealed
item.content:encoded:
Bethesda is preparing the world for another epic day. Fallout Day 2025 has been announced, and there are broadcast date details, along with information on its start time, and a sneak peek at what the company could have in store for you all on the S.P.E.C.I.A.L day.

Some people love Christmas Day, others look forward to Thanksgiving. But for long-time Bethesda fans, it probably doesn‚Äôt get better than Fallout Day. The 2025 edition is upon us, and last year‚Äôs showcase provided huge updates on Fallout 76 and new content and DLC.

Fallout Day 2025 Date & Time Announced

Bethesda and Fallout fans can look forward to Fallout Day 2025 starting at 1 PM ET on October 23!

News of this comes directly from Fallout‚Äòs social media: ‚ÄúSave the date! Our annual FalloutDay Broadcast will be streaming live on October 23 at 1 PM ET, with the FalloutforHope post-show immediately following.‚Äù

If you didn‚Äôt know, FalloutforHope is a charity organized by Fallout content creator Kenneth Vigue and aims to ‚Äúoffer hope and relief for children and their families at a time of year when loss is felt and help keenly needed.‚Äù

This is amazing publicity for a good cause, which should round off what is usually a solid show.

While Bethesda hasn‚Äôt explicitly revealed anything in particular that will be shown off or announced during Fallout Day 2025, the company has said the broadcast will feature ‚Äúnews about existing Fallout games‚Äù and news on upcoming Fallout fan events.

Could there be a surprise announcement regarding a Fallout 3 Remaster lying in wait? I guess we‚Äôll all have to tune in and find out.

What was your favorite aspect of Fallout Day 2024? Is there anything you‚Äôre hoping to see during the show? Head to the Insider Gaming forum and let us know, and don‚Äôt be afraid to leave a comment on this article.

Be sure to check out October 2025‚Äôs Wave 1 Xbox Game Pass titles, and Skate charging $40 for a cardboard Dead Space skin for the latest news.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.

item.title: Is Jurassic World Evolution 3 Coming to Xbox Game Pass?
item.content:encoded:
Jurassic World Evolution is roaring onto the scene and, if you fancy yourself as being better at managing prehistoric dinosaurs than John Hammond, it‚Äôs the perfect game for you‚Äîand we‚Äôve got the details on the Game Pass status.

Releasing October 21, Jurassic World Evolution 3 makes it a trilogy for Frontier Developments, with major additions being the introduction of baby dinosaurs and modular building‚Äîtwo features that have starred in sister titles Planet Coaster and Planet Zoo.

With the title landing in a packed release schedule for games, it‚Äôs understandable to wonder if a Game Pass subscription can save you some cash, and we‚Äôve got all the details on whether it‚Äôs being added to the service.

Can You Play Jurassic World Evolution 3 on Xbox Game Pass?

No, Jurassic World Evolution 3 will not be available to play with an Xbox Game Pass subscription when the title releases on October 21.

Although we‚Äôre yet to see a full reveal of the titles coming to Game Pass in October, with the first wave of releases not covering the entire month, Jurassic World Evolution 3 is not expected to be among the other additions coming later this month.

Jurassic World Evolution 3 is not a first-party Xbox title, which would have resulted in automatic inclusion in the service, so any announcement of the title featuring in the catalog would have come well in advance.

Will Jurassic World Evolution 3 Come to Xbox Game Pass?

There is no news about Jurassic World Evolution 3 coming to Xbox Game Pass in the future, although history suggests it‚Äôs likely to occur at some point.

Jurassic World Evolution 2 is currently available on the service, having featured several times in the past, while the original game has also had extended spells in the subscription service.

Other Frontier Development titles, including Planet Coaster, have also appeared on the service in the past. However, Planet Zoo and Planet Coaster 2 are yet to appear on the service, and it‚Äôs likely they would make an appearance first before Jurassic World Evolution 3‚Äîalthough that‚Äôs not guaranteed.

If we are to see Jurassic World Evolution 3 join the playlist, it will likely be a fairly decent period of time in the future.

What are you most excited to see in Jurassic World Evolution 3? Let us know in the Insider Gaming forum.

For more Game Pass, find out if Powerwash Simulator 2 is joining the service, and read about the addition of Fortnite Crew for Ultimate subscribers.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.

item.title: Xbox Game Pass Games For October 2025 Wave 1 Announced
item.content:encoded:
Microsoft has announced the next batch of games coming to Xbox Game Pass in October as part of Wave 1 for the month. This upcoming wave features 13 games, with one being available as early as today (October 8).

The first title available this month is Supermarket Simulator for Game Pass Ultimate, Premium, and PC subscribers on cloud, console, and PC. But that‚Äôs not the only new game being offered as October‚Äôs first wave includes three day-one releases, among others.

Wave 1 Xbox Game Pass Games For October

After Supermarket Simulator comes Baldur‚Äôs Gate and Baldur‚Äôs Gate II: Enhanced Editions on PC for Ultimate, Premium, and PC members on October 9. October 14 sees The Casting of Frank Stone available for the same tiers on PC, cloud, and Xbox Series X|S.

October 15 has five game additions, including a day-one launch for Ball x Pit. The games coming on the 15th are:

  • Ball x Pit (Game Pass Ultimate and PC Game Pass for cloud, console, and PC)
  • The Grinch: Christmas Adventures (Ultimate, Premium, and PC for cloud, console, and PC)
  • Eternal Strands (Premium for cloud, PC, and Xbox Series X|S)
  • He Is Coming (Premium for PC)
  • Ninja Gaiden 2 Black (Premium for cloud, PC, and Xbox Series X|S)

On October 16, Pax Dei will be available on PC for Ultimate, Premium, and PC subscribers, while the next day-one title comes on October 17 with Double Fine‚Äôs Keeper for cloud, PC, and Xbox Series X|S. Keeper is available for Ultimate and PC members.

The last two games launch on October 21 for the service. The first is Evil West on cloud, console, and PC for all subscribers of Premium, Ultimate, and PC. And, finally, the big addition of the wave is Ninja Gaiden 4, available for Ultimate and PC members only.

Other Game Pass Additions

In addition to the new games for the service, Game Pass members will receive a few other benefits. You can check those out for yourself below:

  • Dead by Daylight: Sinister Grace ‚Äì Available now
  • Diablo IV: Season of Infernal Chaos ‚Äì Available now
  • FBC: Firebreak ‚Äì Breakpoint Update ‚Äì Available now
  • Grounded 2: Hairy and Scary Update ‚Äì Available now
  • Valorant: Play the new Agent Veto (Console and PC) ‚Äì Available now
  • Age of Empires II: DE ‚Äì Chronicles: Alexander the Great ‚Äì October 14
  • Call of Duty: Warzone ‚Äì Game Pass Pack 4 (Cloud, Console, and PC) ‚Äì October 15

What do you think of the new games coming to Xbox Game Pass for Wave 1 in October? Leave your thoughts down in the comments below, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming, check out what games were the best-selling titles for August 2025. And don‚Äôt forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
